titleStmt.title: Moderatus, the most delectable & famous historie of the blacke knight:[...]
titleStmt.author: Parry, Robert, fl. 1540-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Ihones, at the signe of the Rose and Crowne, neer to S. Andrewes Church in Holburne,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: R.P. Gent., i.e. Robert Parry.
Running title reads: The strange aduentures of the blacke knight.
Imperfect; leaf X3 torn, slightly affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
